author: timbeiko
content:
A lot of people have been posting about merge timelines across various channels. There hasn't been a date set. Please monitor blog.ethereum.org for announcements and be on the lookout for scams. The latest update is this one:
https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/03/14/kiln-merge-testnet/

From the post: 

> A date for the Ethereum mainnet proof-of-stake transition has not been set as of the publication of this post. Any source claiming otherwise is likely to be a scam. Updates will be posted on this blog. Please stay safe!

Going forward, we'll be more aggressive in deleting messages about this because they distract from the technical discussions in channels. Thanks!
